alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 7:55AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Still Possible Through 9 AM... Surface observations, traffic cameras, and satellite imagery show that patchy dense fog continues across coastal Volusia County, Brevard County and Osceola County. Localized visibilities of a half mile or less will be possible through 9 AM, with fog then diminishing through the remainder of the morning. Drivers should prepare to encounter rapid visibility reductions this morning. When driving in fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
